@bokkyshome 2023 3 30 a a1 and a2 31 b c 32 a a1 and a2 33 b and c c 34 a a1 and a2 35 b c 36 a a1 and a2 37 b c 38 a a1 39 a a1 © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 4 any yarn will do for this project use the larger hook size that is recommended for the chosen yarn using a different yarn and or hook size will affect the size and drape of your big splash version 1 that was made with scheepjes colorcrafter has much more drape than the other 3 versions it also ended up a little bit bigger this is caused by the fact that scheepjes colorcrafter is a tad thinner than durable comfy i suggest to go up half a hook size when using durable comfy if you plan on making a pillow with your big splash it will have more drape and it will turn out bigger abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring
